Professional Summary.title: Professional Summary
Professional Summary.description: Results-driven Full Stack Developer and Technology Leader with over 8 years of experience in software engineering, distributed systems, and cloud-native architectures. Proven ability to design, develop, and deploy scalable web applications and APIs using modern technologies including Python, JavaScript, React, Flask, FastAPI, and Java. Skilled in CI/CD pipelines, Docker, RESTful services, and API integration. Strong foundation in DevOps, network operations, and system monitoring with tools like Grafana and Nagios. Experienced in leading cross-functional teams, mentoring developers, and managing cloud migrations. Committed to continuous learning and staying current with advancements in AI, ML, and LLMs.

Monitoring: Grafana, Nagios, Prometheus, ELK
Testing: Pytest, Jest, Selenium (basic), Postman

Certs: Coding Temple – Full Stack Software Engineer
